timeline.message:
Allow to reuse ShuntCompensatorAdder twice

Signed-off-by: Thomas ADAM <tadam@silicom.fr>

timeline.bodyText: @MioRtia why the public API of ShuntCompensatorModel is empty? I would move everything except this method in the public API (i.e. outside the wrapper)
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText:
It shouldn't be in the public API, should it? A shunt compensator model should not be created independently from the shunt for me, this method was just because it was created in the adder (so before the shunt itself is created). The method can be deleted if it is not used that way anymore.
EDIT Read the entire PR, it seems this method is still used, don't take my last remark into account
replies.author: miovd

timeline.bodyText:
I think this class is redundant with AbstractShuntCompensatorModel
@MioRtia Is it ok if we remove it?
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.author: miovd

timeline.bodyText: I would perform the deep copy in the constructor of ShuntCompensatorNonLinearModelImpl (and document it)
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.message:
Remove ShuntCompensatorModelWrapper class

Signed-off-by: Thomas ADAM <tadam@silicom.fr>

Move sections deep copy into ShuntCompensatorNonLinearModel constructor

Signed-off-by: Thomas ADAM <tadam@silicom.fr>

Move internal adder set into add method

Signed-off-by: Thomas ADAM <tadam@silicom.fr>

timeline.bodyText: This is not sufficient to ensure someone don't set two different models. You should introduce a common interface or reset the corresponding attribute in the add methods.
timeline.author: mathbagu
mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: I think clone is more commonly used
timeline.author: mathbagu

Taking into account PR reviews
